                   M O V i E   S U M M A R Y                                    
  Jackie plays Foh, an expert mechanic who has returned from Japan after        
  a master course at Mitsubishi Motors. He runs a small business in Hong Kong   
  along with his father and two sisters. In his spare time, he also helps the   
  police out with cars that have been illegally upgraded. One night, psychotic  
  race car driver Warner Krugerman, aka Cougar, speeds past Foh and the cops.   
  Foh gets into a car and stops Cougar heroicly. Cougar lands in jail, but      
  breaks out eventually. He gets revenge on Foh by trashing his business and    
  kidnapping his sisters. The only way Foh can get his sisters back is by       
  racing cougar in Japan. He now must retrain himself in race car driving so he 
  can be at his best to race Cougar.                                            
                                                                                  
                                                                               
  More information @ http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0114126/
